getting-started.title: 开始使用
getting-started.desc: 简要介绍，以及如何下载、使用，还有基本模版和案例，等等。
getting-started.descEn: An overview of Bootstrap, including how to download and use it, some basic templates and examples, and more.

layout.title: 布局
layout.desc: 构建页面的选项，包括全局样式，必不可少的脚手架(scaffolding), 网格系统等。
layout.descEn: Options for structuring your pages with Bootstrap, including global styles, required scaffolding, grid system, and more.

content.title: 内容
content.desc: 常用HTML元素的样式，包括标准化、排版、图像、表格等。
content.descEn: Styles for displaying content with some of the most commonly used HTML elements, including normalization, typography, images, tables, and more.

components.title: 组件
components.desc: 十几种可以重复使用的组件，包括按钮、下拉菜单、输入组、导航、提示框等。
components.descEn: Over a dozen reusable components built to provide buttons, dropdowns, input groups, navigation, alerts, and much more. Bring Bootstrap's components to life with over a dozen custom jQuery plugins. Easily include them all, or one by one.

utility.title: 实用工具
utility.desc: 常用 JS 工具方法。

about.title: 关于
about.desc: 了解这个项目的历史，认识这个维护团队，并了解如何使用这个Bootstrap商标。
about.descEn: Learn about the project's history, meet the maintaining teams, and find out how to use the Bootstrap brand.

migration.title: 迁移
migration.desc: 指导如何从Bootstrap v3.x升级到v4.x，重点是主要的变化，有什么新内容，以及哪些内容被移除了。
migration.descEn: Guidance on how to upgrade from Bootstrap v3.x to v4.x with emphasis on major changes, what's new, and what's been removed.

browser-bugs.title: 浏览器 Bugs
browser-bugs.descEn: A sort of the browser bugs that Bootstrap is currently grappling with.
